name: Levelhead
summary: Build, play, share and compete in Levelhead, the platformer maker. Create challenging levels with the deep, intuitive systems of the level editor, then share those levels with the world and gain a following!
info:
• 中文名: 崩溃制造
  • 开发: Butterscotch Shenanigans
  • 发行: Butterscotch Shenanigans
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: Platformer
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2020年4月30日
  • 官方网站: https://www.bscotch.net/games/levelhead
